data.meanings: bore it, carried it, took it up, carried it, convey, show/manifest, conceive.
data.sentence: The word فَالْحَامِلَاتِ comes from the root ح م ل and is associated with the meanings: bore it, carried it, took it up, carried it, convey, show/manifest, conceive.

data.meanings: to be heavy (in ear), deaf, heaviness in the ear, be gentle, gracious, respected.
data.sentence: The word وِقْرًا comes from the root و ق ر and is associated with the meanings: to be heavy (in ear), deaf, heaviness in the ear, be gentle, gracious, respected.
